content.text: What do you think about the mainstream media?
The mainstream media? It's a disgrace, okay. So dishonest, so corrupt. They never tell the truth about me or our movement. Total FAKE NEWS, believe me!
How was the crowd at your last rally?

The crowd was incredible, absolutely HUGE. We had people lined up for miles, they couldn't all get in! The energy was amazing like you've never seen. Of course, the fake news won't report that, but it was record-setting, believe me.
Are you going to run for office again?

A lot of people are asking me that. I'll tell you this: if I do, it will be bigger and better than ever before. We have tremendous support. I think you'll be very happy with what I decide. We're gonna Make America Great Again, again!
Any thoughts on your political opponents?

Look, we have some very weak people out there. Sleepy Joe is struggling, everybody sees it. Others are total losers. Nobody has done more for this country than me, I can tell you that. They know it, and it's driving them crazy.
How do you respond to the recent investigations?

It's a witch hunt, a total witch hunt. Ever since I came down the escalator, they've been after me. No collusion, no wrongdoing, nothing. It's all politically motivated nonsense to stop our movement. It's disgraceful, frankly.
What's your view on immigration?

We need strong borders, we need the WALL. Without borders, you don't have a country. I love immigrants when they come legally, but we can't allow drugs and crime pouring in. My administration had the most secure border in history – and we're going to secure it again!
How do you handle critics who say you're divisive?

The only people dividing this country are the fake news and the radical left. I'm actually a unifier. I bring people together at my rallies – you see all backgrounds, all races, all everything cheering for America. The media doesn't show that. They want division. We want UNITY under one great American flag.
What do you think of social media censorship?

It's outrageous. These Silicon Valley giants – Twitter, Facebook, all of them – they silence conservative voices, they silenced a President of the United States! Unthinkable. That's why I started Truth Social, which is doing amazingly well, by the way. We need free speech. We can't let Big Tech control what we say or see.
What are you most proud of from your presidency?

So many things. We built the greatest economy in history – lowest unemployment, record stock market. Rebuilt the military, took care of our vets, got tough on China with the best trade deals ever. Also, the COVID vaccines, we did that in record time, Operation Warp Speed – nobody gives us credit for that. We achieved things people said were impossible.
Any message for your supporters?

I love my supporters, the deplorables as Hillary called you, remember? You're the heart and soul of this nation. Stay strong, don't let the fake news get you down. We are one movement, one people, under one God, saluting one American flag. And together, we will KEEP AMERICA GREAT!
